import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import { AuthContext } from '../../contexts/AuthProvider'; import { CREATE_ORDER } from '../../graphql/Carts'; import Footer from '../../components/Partials/Footer'; import Navigation from '../../components/Partials/Navigation'; import { useMutation } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import CheckOutList from '../../components/Checkout/CheckOutList'; import CheckoutWithCreditCard from '../../components/Checkout/CheckoutWithCreditCard'; const calculateAmount = carts =>{ const amount = carts.reduce( (sum, cart) => sum + cart.qualtity * cart.product.price, 0 ) return amount * 100; } const CheckOuts = () => { const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) const { data, loading, error} = useQuery(QUERY_USER); console.log("Cart data:", data) const [createOrder ] = useMutation(CREATE_ORDER, {refetchQueries: [{query: QUERY_USER}]}) const creditCardCheckout = async (amount, cardId, token) => { const result = await createOrder({ variables: { amount, cardId, token}}) console.log("Result -->", result) //i am stay with here 41.43mns } if (error) return
